sentences.english: Light colours provide an effective backdrop for pictures or a mirror.
sentences.chinese: 浅色是挂放图画或镜子很有效果的衬托。

sentences.english: Wear light colored clothing made of natural materials.
sentences.chinese: 天然材料制成的，穿浅色服装。

sentences.english: The ribbed aluminium panels on the plinth form a light-coloured band that wraps around the building.
sentences.chinese: 底座上肋骨状的铝面板形成了环绕建筑的浅色带。

sentences.english: The new water-based mold coating for resin-bonded sand mold and core for aluminium castings has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 为铝铸件树脂砂型芯研制出新型的水基浅色涂料。

sentences.english: Do not use fabric softener. Wash dark colours separately.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用柔顺剂洗涤，与浅色衣物分开洗涤。

sentences.english: The properties of high-quality light and colorless pinene resins were studied.
sentences.chinese: 考察了浅色和无色蒎烯树脂的性质。

sentences.english: Conversely, lighter-colored objects reflect more energy and stay cooler.
sentences.chinese: 相反，浅色的物体反射更多的能量并保持凉爽。

sentences.english: However, a pit in the floor of the crater has exposed light-toned, fractured rock.
sentences.chinese: 然而，撞击坑的底部却暴露出浅色，断裂的岩石。

sentences.english: Under the hot sun, the student in the middle resorts to a light-colored wig to block the sun.
sentences.chinese: 烈日当空，走在中间的学生，索性带顶浅色假发遮阳。

sentences.english: People with light complexioned skin are more sensitive to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 浅色皮肤的人对阳光更敏感。

sentences.english: The facades are shown covered in batons of light-coloured timber.
sentences.chinese: 建筑外表面都覆盖了浅色的竖向木材条。

sentences.english: It is better to wear a light-coloured suit, and suitable to take cooling drink.
sentences.chinese: 最好是穿浅色衣服，并且，适当地冷饮。

sentences.english: A feminine berry that's not too dramatic for fair skin.
sentences.chinese: 女人味十足的梅子色对于浅色皮肤来说也不夸张。

sentences.english: Light color has distensible effect, can increase the dimensional result on the vision.
sentences.chinese: 浅色则有扩大的效果，会增加视觉上的空间效果。

sentences.english: Used in deep color skin or light color soft hair.
sentences.chinese: 可用在深色皮肤及浅色的细软毛发上。

sentences.english: This product is suitable for the polishing of all kinds of light-colored granite surface and brilliant one to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 本品适宜各类浅色花岗岩表面的抛光及晶面处理。
